alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; Niobrara County; North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 2:13PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Niobrara, northwestern Platte and southeastern Converse Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 213 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Douglas, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glendo. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 112 and 135. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; Niobrara County; North Laramie Range
